mapper.sql: t.uuid uuid, t.clbm clbm, t.clmc clmc, t.ssdz ssdz, -- t.ssdzmc ssdzmc, t.xzqh xzqh, t.cllx cllx, t.cphm cphm, t.clzt clzt, t.sccj sccj, t.jglgd jglgd, t.sbll sbll, t.zsl zsl, t.xfpll xfpll, t.sbedyl sbedyl, t.czmhjlb czmhjlb, t.czmhjl czmhjl, t.mhjhhb mhjhhb, t.gpsbh gpsbh, t.delete_flag deleteFlag, t.datasource datasource, t.bz bz, t.jdh jdh, TO_CHAR(t.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') sjc, t.reserve1 reserve1, t.reserve2 reserve2, t.reserve3 reserve3, TO_CHAR(t.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve4, t.gis_x gisX, t.gis_y gisY
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(0) AS NUM FROM YAGL_WL_XFCLXX t WHERE 1=1 AND DELETE_FLAG = 'N'

SELECT , c2.CODE_NAME xzqhmc, c4.CODE_NAME cllxmc, c6.CODE_NAME clztmc, c8.CODE_NAME czmhjlbmc, c9.DZMC ssdzmc FROM YAGL_WL_XFCLXX t
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c1 on c1.CODETYPE = 'XZQH' And c1.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c2 On c1.CODEID = c2.CODEID And c2.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.XZQH = c2.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c3 on c3.CODETYPE = 'CLLX' And c3.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c4 On c3.CODEID = c4.CODEID And c4.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.CLLX = c4.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c5 on c5.CODETYPE = 'CLZT' And c5.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c6 On c5.CODEID = c6.CODEID And c6.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and substr(t.CLZT,2,1) = substr(c6.CODE_VALUE,1,1)
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c7 on c7.CODETYPE = 'YJLX' And c7.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c8 On c7.CODEID = c8.CODEID And c8.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.czmhjlb = c8.CODE_VALUE
LEFT JOIN YAGL_XFDZ c9 ON (t.SSDZ=c9.DZID AND c9.DELETE_FLAG = 'N')
INNER JOIN YAGL_XFDZ c10 ON (t.SSDZ=c10.DZID AND c10.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND c10.dzbm LIKE concat(RTRIM(#{ssdz},0),'%'))
WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'
ORDER BY XZQH,CLLX,CPHM ASC

SELECT , c2.CODE_NAME xzqhmc, c4.CODE_NAME cllxmc, c6.CODE_NAME clztmc, c8.CODE_NAME czmhjlbmc, c9.DZMC ssdzmc FROM YAGL_WL_XFCLXX t
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c1 on c1.CODETYPE = 'XZQH' And c1.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c2 On c1.CODEID = c2.CODEID And c2.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.XZQH = c2.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c3 on c3.CODETYPE = 'CLLX' And c3.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c4 On c3.CODEID = c4.CODEID And c4.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.CLLX = c4.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c5 on c5.CODETYPE = 'CLZT' And c5.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c6 On c5.CODEID = c6.CODEID And c6.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and substr(t.CLZT,2,1) = substr(c6.CODE_VALUE,1,1)
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c7 on c7.CODETYPE = 'YJLX' And c7.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c8 On c7.CODEID = c8.CODEID And c8.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.czmhjlb = c8.CODE_VALUE
LEFT JOIN YAGL_XFDZ c9 ON (t.SSDZ=c9.DZID AND c9.DELETE_FLAG = 'N') WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND t.uuid = #{value} ORDER BY XZQH,CLLX,CPHM ASC
mapper.insert:
SELECT SYS_GUID() AS pkid FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO YAGL_WL_XFCLXX(uuid,clbm,clmc,ssdz,ssdzmc,xzqh,cllx,cphm,clzt,sccj,jglgd,sbll,zsl,xfpll,sbedyl,czmhjlb,czmhjl,mhjhhb,gpsbh,delete_flag,datasource,bz,jdh,sjc,reserve1,reserve2,reserve3,reserve4,gis_x,gis_y) VALUES(#{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{clbm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{clmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{ssdz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{ssdzmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xzqh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cllx,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{cphm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{clzt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sccj,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jglgd,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{sbll,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{zsl,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{xfpll,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{sbedyl,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{czmhjlb,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{czmhjl,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{mhjhhb,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{gpsbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'N',#{datasource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sjc,jdbcType=DATE},#{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve4,jdbcType=DATE},#{gisX,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{gisY,jdbcType=DOUBLE})
mapper.update: UPDATE YAGL_WL_XFCLXX t SET t.DELETE_FLAG = 'Y' WHERE 1=1 AND t.PKID = #{value}

INSERT INTO YAGL_WL_XFCLXX(uuid,clbm,clmc,ssdz,ssdzmc,xzqh,cllx,cphm,clzt,sccj,jglgd,sbll,zsl,xfpll,sbedyl,czmhjlb,czmhjl,mhjhhb,gpsbh,delete_flag,datasource,bz,jdh,sjc,reserve1,reserve2,reserve3,reserve4,gis_x,gis_y) VALUES
#{item.uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} uuid,#{item.clbm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} clbm,#{item.clmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} clmc,#{item.ssdz,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ssdz,#{item.ssdzmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ssdzmc,#{item.xzqh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} xzqh,#{item.cllx,jdbcType=DOUBLE} cllx,#{item.cphm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} cphm,#{item.clzt,jdbcType=VARCHAR} clzt,#{item.sccj,jdbcType=VARCHAR} sccj,#{item.jglgd,jdbcType=DOUBLE} jglgd,#{item.sbll,jdbcType=DOUBLE} sbll,#{item.zsl,jdbcType=DOUBLE} zsl,#{item.xfpll,jdbcType=DOUBLE} xfpll,#{item.sbedyl,jdbcType=DOUBLE} sbedyl,#{item.czmhjlb,jdbcType=VARCHAR} czmhjlb,#{item.czmhjl,jdbcType=DOUBLE} czmhjl,#{item.mhjhhb,jdbcType=VARCHAR} mhjhhb,#{item.gpsbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} gpsbh,'N' delete_flag,#{item.datasource,jdbcType=VARCHAR} datasource,#{item.bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR} bz,#{item.jdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} jdh,#{item.sjc,jdbcType=DATE} sjc,#{item.reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve1,#{item.reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve2,#{item.reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve3,#{item.reserve4,jdbcType=DATE} reserve4,#{item.gisX,jdbcType=DOUBLE} gis_x,#{item.gisY,jdbcType=DOUBLE} gis_y
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE uuid = VALUES(uuid), clbm = VALUES(clbm), clmc = VALUES(clmc), ssdz = VALUES(ssdz), ssdzmc = VALUES(ssdzmc), xzqh = VALUES(xzqh), cllx = VALUES(cllx), cphm = VALUES(cphm), clzt = VALUES(clzt), sccj = VALUES(sccj), jglgd = VALUES(jglgd), sbll = VALUES(sbll), zsl = VALUES(zsl), xfpll = VALUES(xfpll), sbedyl = VALUES(sbedyl), czmhjlb = VALUES(czmhjlb), czmhjl = VALUES(czmhjl), mhjhhb = VALUES(mhjhhb), gpsbh = VALUES(gpsbh), delete_flag = VALUES(delete_flag), datasource = VALUES(datasource), bz = VALUES(bz), jdh = VALUES(jdh), sjc = VALUES(sjc), reserve1 = VALUES(reserve1), reserve2 = VALUES(reserve2), reserve3 = VALUES(reserve3), reserve4 = VALUES(reserve4), gis_x = VALUES(gis_x), gis_y = VALUES(gis_y)
mapper.select:
SELECT , c2.CODE_NAME xzqhmc, c4.CODE_NAME cllxmc, c6.CODE_NAME clztmc, c8.CODE_NAME czmhjlbmc, c9.DZMC ssdzmc FROM YAGL_WL_XFCLXX t
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c1 on c1.CODETYPE = 'XZQH' And c1.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c2 On c1.CODEID = c2.CODEID And c2.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.XZQH = c2.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c3 on c3.CODETYPE = 'CLLX' And c3.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c4 On c3.CODEID = c4.CODEID And c4.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.CLLX = c4.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c5 on c5.CODETYPE = 'CLZT' And c5.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c6 On c5.CODEID = c6.CODEID And c6.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and substr(t.CLZT,2,1) = substr(c6.CODE_VALUE,1,1)
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c7 on c7.CODETYPE = 'YJLX' And c7.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c8 On c7.CODEID = c8.CODEID And c8.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.czmhjlb = c8.CODE_VALUE
LEFT JOIN YAGL_XFDZ c9 ON (t.SSDZ=c9.DZID AND c9.DELETE_FLAG = 'N')
INNER JOIN YAGL_XFDZ c8 ON (t.SSDZ=c8.DZID AND c8.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND c8.dzbm LIKE concat(RTRIM(#{ssdz},0),'%'))
WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'
ORDER BY XZQH,CLLX,CPHM ASC
